patterns_found: Entity Mismatch (FIM Global vs. FIM Latin America)
iterations.reasoning: The content analyzed is from the global FIM (Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme) website, not the specific target entity 'FIM Latin America'. While the global parent company provides context on governance and regulations, it does not contain specific procurement signals, technology stacks, or job postings relevant to the Latin American regional subsidiary. The content is primarily public-facing sports information (calendars, news, regulations) rather than corporate procurement intelligence.

job_postings.title: Client Account Manager - Global FIM Latin America

patterns_found: Entity Mismatch (UBS vs. FIM Latin America)
Job Posting Context (Service Delivery vs. Procurement)
iterations.reasoning: The scraped content is a job posting from UBS (a global bank) for a 'Client Account Manager' role. The term 'FIM' in the title stands for 'Financial Intermediaries Management' (a business unit/division within UBS), not the target entity 'FIM Latin America'. While the role mentions 'LATAM South' and 'Geneva', it pertains to banking operations and client servicing, not the procurement or governance of the FIM Latin America organization. This is a false positive match on the acronym.
